scripts.ios:build: pnpm gen && xcodebuild -project HighswarmFeed.xcodeproj -scheme HighswarmFeed -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=26.2,name=iPhone 17' build
scripts.ios:test: pnpm gen && xcodebuild -project HighswarmFeed.xcodeproj -scheme HighswarmFeed -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=26.2,name=iPhone 17' test
